 10.51 Mail

This section summarizes how the lab's official mail channels are managed.

 Incoming

- E-Mail is handled by the Team Assistant (e-mail: see team website).
- Physical mail is retrieved from the mailroom on a regular basis (Postfach Nr.: 44).
- Incoming physical mail is tracked in 10.5

from the mailroom on a regular basis (Postfach Nr.: 44).
- Incoming physical mail is tracked in 10.51 Ausgangspost _Eingangspost.xlsx{: target="_blank"}.

{: .text-center} 


- Email: "Terminplanung" (UnivIS): primarily track the deadline for entering courses in FlexNow 

 Processing

- **Physical mail** that needs to be archived in paper is added to 19 Archive{: target="_blank"}:

  <div style="display: flex; align-items: center;">
    <ul style="margin: 0;">
        <li>Only mandatory document

isplay: flex; align-items: center;">
  • Only mandatory documents are archived in paper form
  • They receive a unique ID XXXXXX (Paginierstempel)
  • Scanned and added to 19.XXXXXX.

- GW applies OCR (Nextcloud notifications are activated) - Physical mail (documents) related to **theses**: - For signed topic confirmations, thesis supervisors update the overview{: target="_blank"}. Check and remind (if necessary): thesis advisors should have moved the documents related to the thesis to 35 theses{: target="_blank"}. - Submissions, an is

ve moved the documents related to the thesis to 35 theses{: target="_blank"}.
  - Submissions, an issue must be created in the theses-confidential{: target="_blank"}, uploading the digital version of the thesis. The paper version is archived immediately.
  - Reviews are scanned, the PDF is added to 14.04, and the paper version is sent to the examination office (no cover letter, Hauspost: Ref II/3).
